buttons0: try not to hold the buttons.
buttons5: Step on orange spheres 5 times at most
buttons10: Step on orange spheres 10 times at most
buttons15: Step on orange spheres 15 times at most
buttons20: Step on orange spheres 20 times at most
gremlins0: Danger lurks with the gremlins, so don't ever cross them!
gremlins5: walk on gremlins 5 times or less
gremlins10: walk on gremlins 10 times or less
gremlins15: walk on gremlins 15 times or less
gremlins20: Don't step on gremlins more than 20 times
vases5: Do not touch vases more than five times.
vases15: You can walk through vases fifteen times and no more.
vases20: You can walk through vases 20 times and no more.
hazards0: You never want to stand on puddles.
hazards5: Step onto the puddles no more than 5 times.
hazards10: Step onto the puddles no more than 10 times.
hazards15: Step onto the puddles no more than 15 times.
hazards20: Step onto the puddles no more than 20 times.
pillars0: Don't put your hands on the pillars
pillars5: Do not touch pillars more than 5 times.
pillars10: Do not touch pillars more than ten times.
pillars15: Do not touch pillars more than 15 times.
pillars20: Do not touch pillars more than 20 times.
